body_content.explanation: (especially of music, etc.) reduced to its simplest form, with only the most basic and essential features:
examples: Their new record is pleasingly stripped back.
Recently he has been making far more stripped-back, less complex, choral music.

body_content.explanation: (of a building, room, etc.) having had furniture, decoration, etc. removed so that it is in its original state:
examples: The walls are stripped back to the original limewash.
She loved the stripped-back minimalism of the new gallery space.
